articles.title: NBA All-Star Game 2021: Players react to Stephen Curry's 'cheat code' performance in 3-Point Contest - Sporting News AU
articles.description: Stephen Curry won the 2021 MTN DEW 3-Point Contest in thrilling fashion, draining his last shot to defeat Mike Conley Jr. in the final round. Curry's performance had everyone in awe, including his teammates and peers.
articles.content:
You can always count on Stephen Curry to put on a show.
